spell_tooltip.description: Incapacitates the target for 1 min. Limit 1. Damage may cancel the effect.
Kick upwards, dealing 372,090 Physical damage, and reducing the effectiveness of healing on the target for 10 sec.
Kick upwards, dealing 367,943 Physical damage, and reducing the effectiveness of healing on the target for 10 sec.
Increases a friendly target's movement speed by 70% for 6 sec and removes all roots and snares.
Rising Sun Kick deals 70% increased damage. Spinning Crane Kick deals 10% additional damage.
Increases all healing taken by 4%.
Reduces all damage taken by 3%.
Removes all Poison and Disease effects from the target.

Every 10 sec, your next Vivify becomes instant and its healing is increased by 40%.

This effect also reduces the energy cost of Vivify by 75%.
Paralysis now removes all Enrage effects from its target.
Jabs the target in the throat, interrupting spellcasting and preventing any spell from that school of magic from being cast for 3 sec.
Reduces the cooldown of Paralysis by 15 sec and the cooldown of Leg Sweep by 10 sec.

Every 15 sec, your next Rising Sun Kick or Vivify releases a wave of Chi energy that flows through friends and foes, dealing 33,989 Nature damage or 74,761 healing. Bounces up to 7 times to targets within 25 yards.
Split your body and spirit, leaving your spirit behind for 15 min. Use Transcendence: Transfer to swap locations with your spirit.
Reduces the cooldown of Roll by 5 sec and increases its maximum number of charges by 1.
Increases all damage dealt by 2%.
Form a Ring of Peace at the target location for 5 sec. Enemies that enter will be ejected from the Ring.
Increases the range of Leg Sweep by 4 yds.
Touch of Death can now be used on targets with less than 15% health remaining, dealing 35% of your maximum health in damage.
Reduces magic damage you take by 60% for 6 sec, and transfers all currently active harmful magical effects on you back to their original caster if possible.

Turns your skin to stone for 15 sec, increasing your current and maximum health by 20% and reducing all damage you take by 20%.

Combines with other Fortifying Brew effects.
Your physical damage taken is reduced by 10% and an additional 10% every 4 sec until you receive a physical attack.
Roll removes a snare effect once every 30 sec.
Invoking Xuen, the White Tiger also spawns a White Tiger Statue at your location that pulses 50,817 damage to all enemies every 2 sec for 10 sec.
Fortifying Brew cooldown reduced by 30 sec.
Magical damage done increased by 4% and healing done increased by 4%.

When a hit deals more than 12% of your maximum health, reduce all damage you take by 20% for 4 sec.

This effect cannot occur more than once every 30 seconds.
Increases your Physical damage done by 4% and Avoidance increased by 4%.
Roll causes you to become lighter than air, allowing you to double jump to dash forward a short distance once within 5 sec, but the cooldown of Roll is increased by 2 sec.

You gain a bonus effect based on your current health.

Above 90% health: Movement speed increased by 5%. This bonus stacks with similar effects.

Between 90% and 35% health: Damage taken reduced by 5%.

Below 35% health: Healing received increased by 10%.
Touch of Death increases your damage by 5% for 30 sec after being cast and its cooldown is reduced by 90 sec.

Pummels all targets in front of you, dealing 791,050 Physical damage to your primary target and 427,167 damage to all other enemies over 3.3 sec. Deals reduced damage beyond 5 targets. Can be channeled while moving.

Fists of Fury's damage is increased by 100% of your haste and Fists of Fury does 10% more damage each time it deals damage, resetting when Fists of Fury ends.

Your auto attack speed is increased by 60% for 8 sec after Fists of Fury ends.

While out of combat, your Chi balances to 2 instead of depleting to empty.

Every 15 sec, your next Tiger Palm also casts Expel Harm and deals 30% additional damage.

 Expel Harm
Expel negative chi from your body, healing for 441,868 and dealing 10% of the amount healed as Nature damage to an enemy within 20 yards.
Rising Sun Kick increases the damage your target receives from you by 3% for 12 sec. Multiple instances may overlap.
Blackout Kick critical strike chance increased by 10% and critical damage increased by 18%.
Increases your maximum Chi by 1, maximum Energy by 20, and your Energy regeneration by 10%.
Critical Strike chance increased by 2%. This effect is increased by 100% while Xuen, the White Tiger is active.
Spinning Crane Kick damage increased by 30% and its radius is increased by 15%.

Tiger Palm causes your next Blackout Kick to strike an additional time, stacking up to 4.

Blackout Kick has a 12% chance to reset the remaining cooldown on Rising Sun Kick.
Rising Sun Kick has a chance equal to 100% of your haste to trigger a second time, dealing 261,486 Physical damage and restoring 1 Chi.

Whenever you deal damage to a target with Fists of Fury, you gain a stack of Chi Energy up to a maximum of 30 stacks.

Using Spinning Crane Kick will cause the energy to detonate in a Chi Explosion, dealing 171,967 Nature damage to all enemies within 8 yards, reduced beyond 5 targets. The damage is increased by 5% for each stack of Chi Energy.
The Blackout Kick! effect also increases the damage of your next Blackout Kick by 350%.

Split into 3 elemental spirits for 15 sec, each spirit dealing 40% of normal damage and healing.

You directly control the Storm spirit, while Earth and Fire spirits mimic your attacks on nearby enemies.

While active, casting Storm, Earth, and Fire again will cause the spirits to fixate on your target.

Your spells and abilities have a chance to activate Flurry of Xuen, unleashing a barrage of deadly swipes to deal 374,506 Physical damage in a 10 yd cone, damage reduced beyond 5 targets.

Invoking Xuen, the White Tiger activates Flurry of Xuen.
The cooldown of Rising Sun Kick is reduced by 1.0 sec and the damage of Blackout Kick is increased by 12%.
Spending Chi has a chance to make your next Spinning Crane Kick free and deal an additional 200% damage.

During Storm, Earth, and Fire, Chi costs are reduced by 1 and Blackout Kick reduces the cooldown of affected abilities by an additional 1 sec. 

Activating Storm, Earth, and Fire resets the remaining cooldown of Rising Sun Kick and grants 2 Chi.
When you consume Blackout Kick!, you have a 100% chance to generate 1 Chi.
Blackout Kick damage increased by 10% and strikes an additional 2 targets at 80% effectiveness.

Summons an effigy of Xuen, the White Tiger for 20 sec. Xuen attacks your primary target, and strikes 3 enemies within 10 yards every 0.8 sec with Tiger Lightning for 26,290 Nature damage.

Every 4 sec, Xuen strikes your enemies with Empowered Tiger Lightning dealing 8% of the damage you have dealt to those targets in the last 4 sec.
You have a 100% chance to gain Blackout Kick! after consuming Dance of Chi-Ji.
You gain 15% haste for 20 sec after summoning your Celestial.
Chi spenders increase the damage of your next Crackling Jade Lightning by 400% and reduce its cost by 5%, stacking up to 20 times.

Performs a devastating whirling upward strike, dealing 461,644 damage to all nearby enemies and an additional 287,253 damage to the first target struck. Damage reduced beyond 5 targets.

Only usable while both Fists of Fury and Rising Sun Kick are on cooldown.
Invoke Xuen, the White Tiger's damage is increased by 30% and its cooldown is reduced by 30 sec.

Rising Sun Kick critical strikes reduce the cooldown of Fists of Fury by 4 sec.

When Fists of Fury ends, the critical strike chance of Rising Sun Kick is increased by 40% for 5 sec.
Blackout Kick, Rising Sun Kick, and Spinning Crane Kick increase damage dealt by your next Fists of Fury by 3%, stacking up to 10 times.
Crackling Jade Lightning now chains to 4 additional targets at 80% effectiveness and its channel time is reduced by 50%.
Whirling Dragon Punch has a 100% chance to activate Dance of Chi-Ji and its cooldown is reduced by 5 sec.
Your Combo Strikes grant a stacking 1% chance for your next Fists of Fury to grant 3% critical strike, haste, and mastery and invoke Xuen, The White Tiger for 10 sec.
Every 598,814 damage you deal generates a Flurry Charge. For each 240 energy you spend, unleash all Flurry Charges, dealing 60,981 Physical damage per charge.
Flurry Strikes have 15% additional chance to critically strike.
Striking the same target 5 times within 2 sec grants 1% Haste, stacking up to 10 times.
Your attacks penetrate 12% armor.
Your Vivify always heals you for an additional 30% of its total value.

Damage dealt by Fists of Fury and Keg Smash counts as double towards Flurry Charge generation.

Fists of Fury damage increased by 20%.
Keg Smash damage increased by 35%.

When your health drops below 50%, summon Whirling Steel, increasing your parry chance and avoidance by 15% for 6 sec.

This effect can not occur more than once every 180 sec.
Flurry Strikes increase your Agility by 1% for 5 sec, stacking up to 20 times.

Energy spenders deal an additional 40% damage.
Every 50 Energy spent reduces the cooldown of Storm, Earth, and Fire by 1 sec.
Blackout Kick deals an additional 20% critical damage and increases the damage of your next set of Flurry Strikes by 10%.

Every 10 Flurry Strikes, become infused with the Wisdom of the Wall, gaining one of the following effects for 16 sec.

Critical strike damage increased by 30%.

Dodge and Critical Strike chance increased by 25% of your Versatility bonus.

Flurry Strikes deal 163,587 Shadow damage to all uncontrolled enemies within 6 yds.

Effect of your Mastery increased by 25%.
Incapacitates the target for 1 min. Limit 1. Damage may cancel the effect.
Kick upwards, dealing 363,215 Physical damage, and reducing the effectiveness of healing on the target for 10 sec.
Kick upwards, dealing 365,126 Physical damage, and reducing the effectiveness of healing on the target for 10 sec.

Reduces the cooldown of Roll by 5 sec and increases its maximum number of charges by 1.
Increases all damage dealt by 2%.
Form a Ring of Peace at the target location for 5 sec. Enemies that enter will be ejected from the Ring.
Touch of Death can now be used on targets with less than 15% health remaining, dealing 35% of your maximum health in damage.
Reduces magic damage you take by 60% for 6 sec, and transfers all currently active harmful magical effects on you back to their original caster if possible.
Reduces the cooldown of Ring of Peace by 5 sec and Song of Chi-Ji's cast time is reduced by 0.5 sec.

Turns your skin to stone for 15 sec, increasing your current and maximum health by 20% and reducing all damage you take by 20%.

Combines with other Fortifying Brew effects.
Your physical damage taken is reduced by 10% and an additional 10% every 4 sec until you receive a physical attack.
Roll removes a snare effect once every 30 sec.
Invoking Xuen, the White Tiger also spawns a White Tiger Statue at your location that pulses 50,817 damage to all enemies every 2 sec for 10 sec.
Increases your maximum health by an additional 10% and your damage taken is reduced by an additional 10% while Fortifying Brew is active.
Magical damage done increased by 4% and healing done increased by 4%.
You and your allies within 10 yards have 4% increased movement speed. Stacks with other similar effects.
Increases your Physical damage done by 4% and Avoidance increased by 4%.
Roll causes you to become lighter than air, allowing you to double jump to dash forward a short distance once within 5 sec, but the cooldown of Roll is increased by 2 sec.

The duration of Storm, Earth, and Fire is extended by 0.25 sec for every Chi you spend.

Every 4 sec, Xuen strikes your enemies with Empowered Tiger Lightning dealing 8% of the damage you have dealt to those targets in the last 4 sec.

Blackout Kick critical strike chance increased by 10% and critical damage increased by 18%.
Increases your maximum Chi by 1, maximum Energy by 20, and your Energy regeneration by 10%.
Critical Strike chance increased by 2%. This effect is increased by 100% while Xuen, the White Tiger is active.
Spinning Crane Kick damage increased by 30% and its radius is increased by 15%.

Tiger Palm causes your next Blackout Kick to strike an additional time, stacking up to 4.

Blackout Kick has a 12% chance to reset the remaining cooldown on Rising Sun Kick.
Rising Sun Kick has a chance equal to 100% of your haste to trigger a second time, dealing 261,486 Physical damage and restoring 1 Chi.

Whenever you deal damage to a target with Fists of Fury, you gain a stack of Chi Energy up to a maximum of 30 stacks.

Using Spinning Crane Kick will cause the energy to detonate in a Chi Explosion, dealing 171,967 Nature damage to all enemies within 8 yards, reduced beyond 5 targets. The damage is increased by 5% for each stack of Chi Energy.
The Blackout Kick! effect also increases the damage of your next Blackout Kick by 350%.

Split into 3 elemental spirits for 15 sec, each spirit dealing 40% of normal damage and healing.

You directly control the Storm spirit, while Earth and Fire spirits mimic your attacks on nearby enemies.

While active, casting Storm, Earth, and Fire again will cause the spirits to fixate on your target.

Your spells and abilities have a chance to activate Flurry of Xuen, unleashing a barrage of deadly swipes to deal 374,506 Physical damage in a 10 yd cone, damage reduced beyond 5 targets.

Invoking Xuen, the White Tiger activates Flurry of Xuen.
The cooldown of Rising Sun Kick is reduced by 1.0 sec and the damage of Blackout Kick is increased by 12%.
Spending Chi has a chance to make your next Spinning Crane Kick free and deal an additional 200% damage.

During Storm, Earth, and Fire, Chi costs are reduced by 1 and Blackout Kick reduces the cooldown of affected abilities by an additional 1 sec. 

Activating Storm, Earth, and Fire resets the remaining cooldown of Rising Sun Kick and grants 2 Chi.
When you consume Blackout Kick!, you have a 100% chance to generate 1 Chi.
Blackout Kick damage increased by 10% and strikes an additional 2 targets at 80% effectiveness.

Summons an effigy of Xuen, the White Tiger for 20 sec. Xuen attacks your primary target, and strikes 3 enemies within 10 yards every 0.8 sec with Tiger Lightning for 26,339 Nature damage.

Every 4 sec, Xuen strikes your enemies with Empowered Tiger Lightning dealing 8% of the damage you have dealt to those targets in the last 4 sec.
You have a 100% chance to gain Blackout Kick! after consuming Dance of Chi-Ji.
You gain 15% haste for 20 sec after summoning your Celestial.
Chi spenders increase the damage of your next Crackling Jade Lightning by 400% and reduce its cost by 5%, stacking up to 20 times.

Performs a devastating whirling upward strike, dealing 462,827 damage to all nearby enemies and an additional 284,337 damage to the first target struck. Damage reduced beyond 5 targets.

Only usable while both Fists of Fury and Rising Sun Kick are on cooldown.
Invoke Xuen, the White Tiger's damage is increased by 30% and its cooldown is reduced by 30 sec.

Rising Sun Kick critical strikes reduce the cooldown of Fists of Fury by 4 sec.

When Fists of Fury ends, the critical strike chance of Rising Sun Kick is increased by 40% for 5 sec.
Blackout Kick, Rising Sun Kick, and Spinning Crane Kick increase damage dealt by your next Fists of Fury by 3%, stacking up to 10 times.
Crackling Jade Lightning now chains to 4 additional targets at 80% effectiveness and its channel time is reduced by 50%.
Whirling Dragon Punch has a 100% chance to activate Dance of Chi-Ji and its cooldown is reduced by 5 sec.
Your Combo Strikes grant a stacking 1% chance for your next Fists of Fury to grant 3% critical strike, haste, and mastery and invoke Xuen, The White Tiger for 10 sec.
Flurry Strikes have 15% additional chance to critically strike.
Striking the same target 5 times within 2 sec grants 1% Haste, stacking up to 10 times.
Your attacks penetrate 12% armor.
Your Vivify always heals you for an additional 30% of its total value.

Damage dealt by Fists of Fury and Keg Smash counts as double towards Flurry Charge generation.

Fists of Fury damage increased by 20%.
Keg Smash damage increased by 35%.

When your health drops below 50%, summon Whirling Steel, increasing your parry chance and avoidance by 15% for 6 sec.

This effect can not occur more than once every 180 sec.
Flurry Strikes increase your Agility by 1% for 5 sec, stacking up to 20 times.

Energy spenders deal an additional 40% damage.
Every 50 Energy spent reduces the cooldown of Storm, Earth, and Fire by 1 sec.
Blackout Kick deals an additional 20% critical damage and increases the damage of your next set of Flurry Strikes by 10%.

Every 10 Flurry Strikes, become infused with the Wisdom of the Wall, gaining one of the following effects for 16 sec.

Critical strike damage increased by 30%.

Dodge and Critical Strike chance increased by 25% of your Versatility bonus.

Flurry Strikes deal 161,614 Shadow damage to all uncontrolled enemies within 6 yds.

Effect of your Mastery increased by 25%.
Incapacitates the target for 1 min. Limit 1. Damage may cancel the effect.
Kick upwards, dealing 370,659 Physical damage, and reducing the effectiveness of healing on the target for 10 sec.
Increases a friendly target's movement speed by 70% for 6 sec and removes all roots and snares.
Increases a friendly target's movement speed by 70% for 6 sec and removes all roots and snares.
Targets you Roll through are snared by 40% for 5 sec.
Rising Sun Kick deals 70% increased damage. Spinning Crane Kick deals 10% additional damage.
Roll and Chi Torpedo travel a small distance further.
Reduces all damage taken by 3%.
Removes all Poison and Disease effects from the target.
While out of combat, your movement speed is increased by 15%.
Jabs the target in the throat, interrupting spellcasting and preventing any spell from that school of magic from being cast for 3 sec.

Hurls a torrent of Chi energy up to 40 yds forward, dealing 213,069 Nature damage to all enemies, and 219,016 healing to the Monk and all allies in its path. Healing and damage reduced beyond 5 targets.
Successfully interrupting an enemy reduces the cooldown of Paralysis and Roll by 5 sec.
Increases the range of Leg Sweep by 4 yds.
Expel Harm's healing increased by 5% and critical strike chance increased by 15%.
Reduces all damage you take by 20% to 50% for 10 sec, with larger attacks being reduced by more.
Smash a keg of brew on the target, dealing 184,271 Physical damage to all enemies within 8 yds and reducing their movement speed by 20% for 15 sec. Deals reduced damage beyond 5 targets.
Clears 50% of your damage delayed with Stagger.

Niuzao's teachings allow you to shuffle during combat, increasing the effectiveness of your Stagger by 100%.

Shuffle is granted by attacking enemies with your Keg Smash, Blackout Kick, and Spinning Crane Kick.
When you Blackout Kick, your Stagger is reduced by 79,374.

When you take damage, you have a chance to summon a Healing Sphere.

Healing Sphere:
Summon a Healing Sphere visible only to you. Moving through this Healing Sphere heals you for 326,430.

Rising Sun Kick and Blackout Kick have a chance to summon a Healing Sphere.

Healing Sphere:
Summon a Healing Sphere visible only to you. Moving through this Healing Sphere heals you for 321,494.
Purify 5% of your Staggered damage each time you gain 3 sec of Shuffle duration.
Dealing damage with Blackout Kick increases the damage of your next Keg Smash by 10%, stacking up to 4 times.
When you fall below 40% health, you gain an absorb for 30% of your recently Purified damage, or a minimum of 8% of your maximum health. Cannot occur more than once every 15 sec.

Drinking from your Brews has a 100% chance to toss a keg high into the air that lands nearby after 3 sec, dealing 69,491 damage to all enemies within 8 yards and reducing their movement speed by 50% for 15 sec.

Drinking from Brews has a 30% chance to coat the Monk with Celestial Flames for 6 sec.

While Celestial Flames is active, Spinning Crane Kick applies Breath of Fire and Breath of Fire reduces the damage affected enemies deal to you by an additional 5%.

Breathe fire on targets in front of you, causing 50,972 Fire damage. Deals reduced damage to secondary targets.

Targets affected by Keg Smash will also burn, taking 33,844 Fire damage and dealing 5% reduced damage to you for 12 sec.
Heals the target for 1 million over 6.6 sec. While channeling, Enveloping Mist and Vivify may be cast instantly on the target.
Heals the target for 1 million over 6.6 sec. While channeling, Enveloping Mist and Vivify may be cast instantly on the target.
Incapacitates the target for 1 min. Limit 1. Damage may cancel the effect.
Kick upwards, dealing 364,189 Physical damage, and reducing the effectiveness of healing on the target for 10 sec.
Kick upwards, dealing 363,070 Physical damage, and reducing the effectiveness of healing on the target for 10 sec.
Reduces all damage taken by you and your target while channeling Soothing Mists by 6%.
Increases a friendly target's movement speed by 70% for 6 sec and removes all roots and snares.
Roll and Chi Torpedo travel a small distance further.
Wraps the target in healing mists, healing for 361,319 over 6 sec, and increasing healing received from your other spells by 30%.

Receive a jolt of energy, empowering your next spell cast:

Enveloping Mist: Immediately heals for 302,070 and is instant cast.
Renewing Mist: Duration increased by 10 sec.
Vivify: No mana cost.
Rising Sun Kick: Cooldown reduced by 9 sec.
Expel Harm: Transfers 25% additional healing into damage and creates a Chi Cocoon absorbing 1.4 million damage.

Surrounds the target with healing mists, restoring 227,735 health over 20 sec.

If Renewing Mist heals a target past maximum health, it will travel to another injured ally within 20 yds.

For every 250,000 Mana you spend, you gain 1 stack of Mana Tea, with a chance equal to your critical strike chance to generate 1 extra stack.

Mana Tea:
Consumes 1 stack of Mana Tea per 0.4 sec to restore 44,625 Mana and reduces the Mana cost of your spells by 30% for 1.00 sec per stack of Mana Tea consumed after drinking.

Can be cast while moving, but movement speed is reduced by 40% while channeling.
